Returns: an array of @B_android#hardware#ConsumerIrManager#CarrierFrequencyRange_E@ objects representing the ranges that the transmitter can support, or null if there was an error communicating with the Consumer IR Service.
getCarrierFrequencies().Description: Query the infrared transmitter's supported carrier frequencies

Returns: true if the device has an infrared emitter, else false.
hasIrEmitter().Description: Check whether the device has an infrared emitter.

Parameters: int: The IR carrier frequency in Hertz.
int: The alternating on/off pattern in microseconds to transmit.
transmit(int,int[]).Description: Transmit an infrared pattern This method is synchronous; when it returns the pattern has been transmitted. Only patterns shorter than 2 seconds will be transmitted.
transmit(int,int[]).FullName: public void transmit (int carrierFrequency, int[] pattern)

Parameters: int: The IR carrier frequency in Hertz.

ClassDesc: Class that operates consumer infrared on the device. Requires the @B_android#content#pm#PackageManager#FEATURE_CONSUMER_IR_E@ feature which can be detected using @B_android#content#pm#PackageManager#hasSystemFeature_E@.
